page.title: 05MOTORWAYS M27 AND M3, HANTS
page.content: IN THE AREA STUDIED,THERE IS ONE MOTORWAY_THE M27, LINKING BOURNEMOUTH TO PORTSMOUTH VIA SOUTHAMPTON. THE A33 FROM SOUTHAMPTON TO WINCHESTER IS PLANNED TO BECOME M3. THESE TWO ALSO LINK UP WITH OTHER MAJOR ROUTEWAYS IN THE SOUTH. MUCH LAND HAS BEEN TAKEN UP _THE ACTUAL TRAFFIC LANES ARE, ON AVERAGE,23 METRES WIDE. HOWEVER, THE EMBANKMENTS AND BORDERING LAND MAKES UP MORE SUBSTANTIAL AREAS OF LAND THAN THIS. IN GRID SQUARE 0441 0117, THE MOTORWAY SEPARATES BUILT UP RESIDENTIAL AREA OF HIGH_CLASS HOUSING FROM THE RURAL LOCATION OF CHILWORTH VILLAGE. MANY OF THESE LARGE HOUSES, WHICH WERE ONCE IN A QUIET SECLUDED AREA, NOW FIND THEMSELVES LOOKING OVER THE MOTORWAY AND TOLERATING HIGHER NOISE LEVELS.
